reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology (Lateral Entry)
reviews.review_title: Nothing other than to explain a good in at most.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college had a good and nice atmosphere to learn and explore things.More entrepreneurial supports and training track, a supportive and good learning platform. Internships were given or can be availed to take part outside the campus too, so no such campaigns or restrictions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college had good facilities of laboratories and machinery, more different kinds of language labs, important and GENAI labs were also facilitated. A lawn food court, playground, DT SNS spine, shuttle court, basketball court were being provided for students skills and love towards sports development.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were most friendly in guiding the curriculum of learning and extracurricular activities, and more encouraging towards personality development. Career readiness paths were mostly taken care of for every student in person. Semesters were mostly cracked as they teach concepts and deliver them accordingly.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Well maintained campus, and  good environment .

detailed_review.Placements: 70-80% of the students from my course were placed. The highest package offered is about 6 LPA, the lowest package offered is 2.5 LPA, and the average package is around 3.5 to 4LPA. Infosys, TCS, Cognizant, and Wipro. Some of the top recruiters offering roles like software developed Etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our department has good Wi-Fi access, well-equipped labs, Smart classrooms and a central library with ample resources. The hostel facilities were decent. The mess food is average, but the canteen offered better options. Medical care is available on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and have good subject knowledge. The teaching quality is decent, with a mix of theory and practical learning. The curriculum is most relevant, but some areas need updating to match industry needs. Semester exams are moderately difficult.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and a smooth environment.

detailed_review.Placements: 70 to 80% of students from my course are placed. The highest package is about 6 LPA, the lowest package offered is 2.5 LPA, and the average is 3.5-4 LPA. Infosys, TCS, Cognizant, and Wipro are some of the top recruiters offering roles like software developer, Etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our department has good Wi-Fi access, well-equipped labs, smart classrooms, and a central library with ample resources. The hostel facilities are decent. Clean rooms, 24/7 water supply. The mess food is average. Canteen offered a better option. It was decent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and have good subject knowledge. The teaching quality is decent, with a mix of theory and practical learning. The curriculum is most relevant, but some areas need updating to match industry needs. Semester exams were moderately difficult.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and well-maintained.

detailed_review.Placements: In the CSE department, 70% of students were placed. The highest package was 8 LPA, the lowest was 3.5 LPA, and the average was around 5 LPA. Top recruiters included Infosys, Wipro, TCS, and Accenture. Around 60% of students got internships at Accenture, Zoho, and Capgemini, mainly as developers and analysts.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The CSE department had modern infrastructure with smart classrooms, high-speed Wi-Fi connections, well-equipped computer labs, and a digital library. Hostel facilities were decent with clean rooms, good medical support, and hygienic food in the mess and canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in the CSE department were very helpful, well-qualified, and had strong technical knowledge. The curriculum was industry-relevant with practical exposure. Semester exams were moderately difficult, and the pass percentage was around 85%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: SNS College of Technology is a really good engineering college in Coimbatore.

detailed_review.Placements: SNS College of Technology is a good placement college in Coimbatore. This college has a good placement training team. They conduct more placement training classes every week. They brought more than 15 companies to the college campus for interviews, for example, Tata Motors, Tata Electronics, Yamaha, Hero, TVS, Hyundai, and Ashok Leyland. The salary packages range from 3.5-12 LPA. 95% of students are placed in reputed companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: SNS College of Technology has more spacious classrooms, a well-stocked library, and more computer laboratories with internet facilities. This college has separate hostel facilities for boys and girls. It also has a good sports ground and emergency medical facilities. The mess and canteen food quality are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers at SNS College of Technology are very friendly and helpful. They clear students' doubts at any time. They teach students both online and offline resources. They are more experienced and qualified professional. They conduct 2-8 lectures every week. They are very helpful to our final year projects and placements. 90% of students pass all exams.
detailed_review.Other: SNS College of Technology has more than 15 courses. The college infrastructure and placement facilities are excellent. The colleges' transportation facilities are also very good. The management conducts more events every month, and the management staff gives more scholarships to well-studied students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Automobile Engineering
reviews.review_title: Infrastructure is good.

detailed_review.Placements: In the automobile department, about 50% of students got placed. The highest package is 5 LPA, the lowest is 2 LPA, and the average is around 2.5 LPA. The top recruiters include Tata, TVS, and Mahindra. Around 50% of students have internships at Tata, TVS, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The automobile department has modern infrastructure with high-tech classrooms, high-speed Wi-Fi, well-equipped computer labs, and a digital library. Hostel facilities are decent with clean rooms, good medical support, and hygienic food in mess and canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in the automobile department are very helpful, well-qualified, and have a strong knowledge. The curriculum is industry relevant with practical exposure. Semester exams are moderately tough, and the pass percentage is around 85%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: In the CSE department, 70% of students are placed. The highest package is 10 LPA, the lowest is 2.5 LPA, and the average is around 4 LPA. Top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, and Accenture. Around 60% got internships at Zoho, Capgemini, and HCL, mainly in developer and analyst roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The CSE department has modern infrastructure with smart classrooms, high-speed Wi-Fi, well-equipped computer labs, and a digital library. Hostel facilities are decent, with clean rooms, good medical support, and hygienic food in the mess and canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in the CSE department are very helpful, well-qualified, and have strong technical knowledge. The curriculum is industry-relevant have practical exposure. Semester exams are moderately difficult. The pass percentage is around 80%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Agriculture Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm satisfied with campus, worth for money.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% of students from agriculture engineering got placed. The highest package is 10 LPA and the lowest is 2 LPA. Top recruiters include Garuda Aerospace and Perfora. They mainly offer internships cum jobs. Primary roles offered are technical assistant and solid works designer. Our college has decent industry exposure and also has SNS Farms for hands-on training.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Every class has a smart board. We have a separate lab with AC facility just for research. Other labs are available like food engineering, unit operations in food processing, farm tractors, heat power engineering, and fluid mechanics laboratory equipped with machines in good working conditions. We have separate benches to seat. Library has a separate section for each department. Agriculture engineering is given first preference and kept in front. Sports and games are given equal importance and gone till the national level. Hostel has AC and non-AC rooms and bathrooms are cleaned daily. Attached and non-attached restrooms are available. Medical rooms are separate. Mess and canteen food is decent. There is a neat and good atmosphere to study.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every staff member is educated and holds a Ph.D. Staff have good industry exposure and are knowledgeable. The teaching quality is perfect. Course curriculum is set to meet modern standards. We have an industrial visit each year and study it properly. Due to syllabus, we can study very well and meet modern standards. Semester exams are very easy if we study. Pass percentage is always above 90%. Faculty members are supportive in project works.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Life at SNS College. We experience studies with freedom.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides decent placements for all students. The placement percentage is above 40% every year. They bring recruiters from both IT fields and also core fields. They also bring top most recruiters from Amazon, Google, Microsoft, Deloitte, etc. The average salary package they provide is around 5 LPA. The highest was 22 LPA last year for the department of electrical and electronic engineering.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a wide and large campus with technology, engineering, nursing, allied science, and pharmacy, and also two separate hostels for boys and girls inside the campus. We have lawn spaces to sit, study, and enjoy during break hours. There are 2 libraries, 2 cafeterias, and one large food court. We have a large sports ground for students. Hostel has lots of cupboards and tables for each student separately. Foodcourt provides good food of good quality at a cheaper price. Food in hostel is average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and encourage us to build our startups and everything. While some are partial towards some particular students which I see as the major disadvantage of faculty members. All faculty members are highly eligible with their degree. Most of them are genuine toward students education and knowledge. Course curriculum is relevant and the practical studies help students to apply them in real life. We have internal exams every 2 months. As we write 3 internal exams the end semester becomes easy.
detailed_review.Other: I chose electronics and communication as I'm very much interested in satellites and research. The best thing about the course is you can apply for any field both hardware and software. More practical studies may help students to improve the course. Our college conducts lots of events both technical and non-technical. They celebrate festivals like Pongal, Christmas, and even Valentine's day is celebrated. Sports day is given equal importance. The favorite spot of most students is the food court where they connect and interact with students of other departments.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The way the structure of the college is designed bring design thinking in every nook and corner.

detailed_review.Placements: About 65% of students are placed in my department. Top companies are Accenture, Cognizant, HCL, Deloitte, and Course 5 Intelligence. Most of the people got internships at SNS iHub and were offered a lot of projects.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel and classrooms have free Wi-Fi. Hostel food is quite good. There are medical and sports facilities. Games are available like basketball, badminton, volleyball, and many more. College provides a lot of labs and other facilities for students to enrich their skills.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers have a doctorate degree. They teach really good. The curriculum is based on a design thinking framework, it also includes blooms taxonomy. Semester exams are moderate. Most of the questions are similar to the internal assessment question paper.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of the scope and the exposure. The companies for placement approach this course first. There are a lot of events happening every week and they keep students engaged. Overall, the college provides scholarships to students based on their education percentage.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: My Genuine review about SNS college of technology.

detailed_review.Placements: Currently, 40% of students were placed in Computer Science and Engineering. The highest package is around 13.5 LPA, the lowest package offered is 2.5 LPA, and the average package is 4.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are CTS, Accenture, Wipro, TCS, and Zoho. Only very few students got internships at ISRO and from some start-up companies. Top roles offered are Software Developer, Mobile App Developer, Full Stack Developer, and DevOps Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The whole campus supports Wi-Fi connectivity, but with very low internet speed. Here, we don't have hi-fi systems in our lab; mostly all the labs are equipped with AC. Every classroom is equipped with a projector and smart board and has proper ventilation. The hostel is situated inside the campus. Talking about the quality of food available in the mess, it is very average. There is a food court available inside the campus which provides good quality food. SNS College of Technology gives more importance to sports and encourages us to participate in various sports events like cricket, basketball, volleyball, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers here are qualified, helpful, and knowledgeable. Mostly every staff member uses smart boards for teaching so that we can easily take notes, and it is way easier to understand than with regular boards. This course is curriculum-relevant, and also it makes the students industry-ready. The semester exams are moderately difficult, and the pass percentage is 50%.
detailed_review.Other: I am fascinated by how technology works, and I would like to solve real-world problems creatively using programming. Many courses are overly theoretical here, so I wish those would be replaced by practical courses. In Coimbatore, SNS is famous for conducting events and festivals. Students here conduct various technical and non-technical events, and students from other colleges can also participate. Since SNS College of Engineering, SNS College of Technology, and SNS College of Pharmacy are on the same campus, it seems crowded. But they manage the crowd by allotting different break times. Extracurricular activities like NSS and NCC are available.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Insights of SNSCT - the paradise.

detailed_review.Placements: The average percentage of students getting placed is 85. The highest package offered in my course is 15 LPA at Cadence Technology, and the lowest package offered is 3.5 LPA at System Solutions. The top recruitment company will be ServiceNow. The major roles are Communication Engineer, Chip Design and Management, and VLSI Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The basic infrastructure in my department is good, except the Wi-Fi connection is very unstable in most of the places. The quality of my hostel is very good, with all the necessary requirements. But the only drawback is the food in my hostel; it is very poor for the fees they are asking. There is also a small games room with chess and carrom in my hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are experts and well-qualified for their roles, and they are very supportive in all ways and very encouraging. The quality of teaching is very good in my college. The curriculum has the Design Thinking framework, which will adapt to all the departments. The semester exams are quite tough,, but we, the students, will get trained through the curriculum, and most of the students will pass with good marks.

reviews.course: B.E. in Biomedical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with my placement, but I will not pursue more core companies.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement of students percentage is 85 above maximum students but still, my depth side of core companies is less. But IT companies are mostly visiting our college placements. Internships are mostly allowed, and try to apply for individual motivation to try IIT, NIT, IIIT, or colleges.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is better than mine. And other students like mind in a different way. Wi-Fi, labs and classrooms are good. Our hostel food is normal but this time we should improve the kitchen side. And review with all staff and improve it.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty, curriculum, and teaching are good. There are three internal exams as well as the final semester. Faculty is a good way to move for students and the curriculum is also good. Monthly, one task is compulsory. Exams will be conducted once every two months.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Good college with an affordable fee.

detailed_review.Placements: Our batch has seen over 25 students placed via campus recruitment, while many others have ventured into business. Most placements are with startups offering competitive packages, reflecting our strong academic training and entrepreneurial spirit. This success showcases our institutions effective education and career support systems.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college also focused on sports and other activities. To support this activity, the college has well-trained staff and trainers and good infrastructure for that. Our college also has good Wi-Fi and hostel facilities, and hostel food is pretty good and it's safe for girls'.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college has well-qualified staff to upskill the students, and their experience and handling of subjects help me understand the subject much easier. The college also focused on the design thinking curriculum. Which is one of the most important of the colleges.
detailed_review.Other: I am very interested in business, so I chose this MBA course.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: Review of SNS College of Technology, SNS Group of Institutions.

detailed_review.Placements:
1. Around 90% students were placed in our course.
2. The top recruiting companies are TCS, Accenture, Everest.
3. Software engineer, developed.
4. The highest package is 12 LPA and the lowest package is 3 LPA, with an average of 5 LPA.
5. 60% of the students got internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
1. Our college has Wi-Fi facility and AC labs with quality systems, and the library has many featured books.
2. The quality of the food provided in the canteen was above average, but I'm not sure about hostel facilities. They support sports students a lot and participate in all the events.
detailed_review.Faculty:
1. Teachers are more friendly and helpful, and everyone has experience teaching for more than 15 years. Overall, the teaching quality is satisfactory.
2. The course is based on theory side only; it doesn't offer learning practical side although you have various lab sessions.
3. You have to self-study a lot. It is elite difficult, and the pass percent is above 60%.
detailed_review.Other: 1. I am interested in IT side, so I choose this course.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: In our college, the placement is good and faculty members are very nice.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement rates vary depending on the course, institution and economic factors; generally, placement rates for reputable institutions and in-demand courses can be high, often exceeding 80% to 90% of salary packages per year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi: Most institutions offer Wi-Fi connectivity across campus, including in classroom labs and common areas. Labs, depending on the course, can range from computers equipped with the latest software and hardware to specialized labs for science and engineering disciplines.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Many teachers are dedicated to helping students succeed and providing support through office hours of tutoring and mentoring.
Qualifications: faculty members typically have relevant academic qualifications and sometimes industry experience teaching with real-world examples.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the college.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides pretty much good placements. Since I'm in computer Science stream, the placements are mostly from companies like accenture, wipro, tcs and cognizant. Around 90 percentage of the students are getting placed every year. The highest ever package received was 12 Lacs per annum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel room is very much good and well maintained. But the food is not quite worthy for the feels we pay. Non veg will be given once in a month. There is a library in our campus. Free Wi-Fi facility is also provided. The labs are also maintained in good condition.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members are friendly and helpful. Even they have their own youtube channel where they upload lectures so that we can learn whenever we have doubts. The curriculum is based on design thinking framework. There will be three internal exams in each semester.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Design thinking based learning.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are pretty good in our college. Around 80 percent of total students were placed last year. Usually placements start from the 7th semester. The highest ever package was 12 lakhs per annum and the average package is around 3 lakhs per annum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Being a hosteller, I feel that the hostel infrastructure is good and the rooms are well maintained. But the food is not up to par. Wi-Fi facilities are available throughout the college and everyone can use 1 GB per day for free. The library is not so large but has the required materials.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers have good knowledge about the subjects, except in a few circumstances. The course curriculum is framed based on the design thinking framework. And it is very effective and makes students industry-ready. There will be three internal exams per semester, which are not so tough.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Good college for MBA studies in Coimbatore.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 70 percent of students have been placed here. The highest package offered here is 6 lacs per annum. The average package is 1 lac per year. Most sales-related companies will be attending for placements. Sales executives, management and HR are the roles offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classrooms look professional. There is a Wi-Fi facility available throughout the campus and students can use 1 GB per day freely. The library is common for both engineering colleges and MBAs. There is one large food court and a café. They are maintained very well. The hostel food is average.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful and mostly friendly with the students. They are also well qualified and knowledgeable. The course curriculum is relevant and easy to follow. There will be 3 internal exams per semester and it is easy to get good marks in those exams. Semester exams will also be easy.
detailed_review.Other: Campus fests are held once in a semester.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of SNS College of Technology, SNS Group of Institutions.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 90% of students got placed in our college. The highest salary package offered is 9 LPA. The average salary package offered is 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Wipro, TCS, CTS, etc. Around 70% of students got internships from our course in local companies. Roles offered are design engineer and web developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is good. Our college provides facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, a library, smart classrooms, a well-maintained and good hostel, a canteen, good medical facilities, etc. The food served in the hostel is average. Our college supports us in sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Each course has 30 faculty members. They are Ph.D. holders. Their way of teaching is good. The course curriculum is relevant to the software and hardware fields. The semester exams are a little bit difficult. We have three assessment exams. The pass percentage is 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I want to learn more about machines and technology. Through this course, we can get hardware and software job roles. Our course provides jobs in top MNCs. Our college conducts many fests. It provides scholarships.

college_info.college_name: SNS College of Technology Admission 2025: Fees, Courses, Eligibility and Selection

faqs.question: Can I get admission in SNS College of Technology with 60% in Class 12?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to pass a minimum of Class 12 to apply for UG programme i.e. BE/ BTech at SNS College of Technology. The minimum aggregate to apply for BE/ BTech programmes is 45%. Hence, aspirants with 60% in Class 12 can get admission. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for BC/ MBC/ SC/ ST candidates.

faqs.question: Is entrance exam required for admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates seeking admission in PG or PhD courses need to pass the accepted entrance exam. Admission to MBA/ MCA is based on TANCET scores. Aspirants need to have a valid CEETA PG score for admission to ME/ M.Tech programme. Besides, candidates seeking admission in PhD programme need to qualify a written test conducted by the Anna University.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers admission under Government Quota and Management Quota. The college shortlists candidates for admission to BE/ BTech programme based on their merit in the last qualifying exam. Admission to MBA/ MCA is based on TANCET scores whereas, CEETA PG is required for ME/ M.Tech programmes. Once selected, candidates need to participate in the counselling and seat allotment. Selected aspirants have to pay the course fee to confirm their seat in the college.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers direct admission in BE/ BTech programme to candidates seeking admission under the Management quota. For admission to PG courses under Management Quota, aspirants need to pass entrance examination conducted by the Consortium of Self-Financing Professional, Arts and Science Colleges in Tamil Nadu, Chennai for Management Quota.

faqs.question: Can I get admission in BTech at SNS College of Technology without TNEA?
faqs.answer: No, candidates are selected for BE/ BTech programme based on their Class 12 scores and TNEA Counselling. SNS College of Technology offers seats to candidates based on their TNEA rank. Inr 2024, Aerospace Engineering was the specialisation with the highest TNEA rank of 29426.

faqs.question: What is the TNEA cutoff for BTech at SNS College of Technology?

faqs.question: Is MBA available at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Yes, SNS College of Technology offers two-year MBA programme spread across four semesters. Admission to MBA programme is based on TANCET score followed by university counselling. Candidates who have passed graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate can apply for the MBA course.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for MBA at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Aspirants who have completed graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate can apply for the MBA course. There is a relaxation of 5% in the aggregate for BC / BCM / MBC, SC (Arunthathiyar), SC & ST candidates belonging to Tamil Nadu. Candidates must hold the documents proving their eligibility for verification at the time of admission.

college_info.college_name: SECE - Sri Eshwar College of Engineering: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary:
Sri Eshwar College of Engineering (SECE) was established in 2008 and is located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. It is an autonomous college and is affiliated to the Anna University, Chennai. The college strives to provide outcome and value-based engineering education. Further, the college has been awarded the Best Industry Linked Emerging Institute Award by AICTE-CII in 2014 and is accredited by the NBA and NAAC.
SECE courses are offered to students at UG and PG levels in the stream of Engineering. The college offers various programmes such as BTech and MTech to students in full-time mode across several specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, etc. These courses offered by the college are recognised by approving bodies like AICTE. In addition to this, the college has a dedicated placement cell and provides placement assistance to students. Sri Eshwar College of Engineering campus provides modern facilities to students including A/C Classrooms, an Auditorium, a Boys' Hostel, a Cafeteria, a Girl's Hostel, a Gym, etc. For more details, candidates can check out the table given below:
Sri Eshwar College of Engineering Highlights 2025

college_info_program.intro: The flagship programmes offered at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering are BTech and MTech. The college offers a wide range of programmes at UG and PG levels. These programmes are offered to students across several specialisations such as Computer Science Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering, etc. Further, the college is affiliated with Anna University, Chennai, and offers programmes in full-time mode. These programmes strive to enhance the learning experience of students in order to prepare them for the industry. summary.college_name: SECE - Sri Eshwar College of Engineering

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: SECE is the best for good placements from the beginning and eco-friendly surroundings.

detailed_review.Placements: In our batch of 2023, around 300 students, almost 280 students got placed in well-known companies with good packages. During our placements, the highest package was 25 LPA, and the lowest package was 3.5 LPA. The topmost roles offered were Software Engineer, Software Developer, and Trainee positions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There were lots of facilities available in our department. Most preferably, I would say the library, which was useful for all final-year and project-delivering students. Almost all areas of the college and hostels had Wi-Fi. There were separate labs for ECE, EEE, CSE, IT, and Mech. Facilities in the college hostel were good, and the food quality was also good. There was a separate roof for medical facilities called the medical center. There were enough sports and games facilities for both day scholars and hostellers to play. More tournaments were held for sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were very helpful, and the quality of the teaching was also good. If they didn't know, they referred to library books or other staff members and cleared our doubts. The course was relevant to the curriculum, and the course would be useful to students during their placements. Semester exams were not difficult. They were easier compared to other departments, and the pass percentage was 60/100 marks.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I was very interested in electronic devices, so I was eager to learn more about them. That’s why I choose ECE. The best thing about the course was that they taught with real-time and live examples. I would say there was nothing to improve in my course. Events and fests were held monthly once, and hackathons were also conducted. Scholarships were available for students who scored top marks in higher secondary, and a first-graduate scholarship was also available.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placement with 100%, best infrastructure, qualified faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides placement training for each student and is divided into different batches to get trained from the 2nd year onwards. The average package is above 5 LPA. The highest package is above 40 LPA. Recently, 10 students got placed. There are many companies that come to our college and conduct internship drives.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure in our college are really good and developed, Classrooms are well-modified within today's version with smartboards. 24/7 availability of Wi-Fi in both hostel as well as college is there. The hostel in the college will be much more comfortable like a 5-star hotel with a separate cot with a free pillow and bedsheet. The food in the hostel has very good quality. It is healthy.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers is our college are highly qualified with Ph.D. and make us understand every topic to learn. Students get trained to get placed in high companies. Semester exams are a bit difficult but we get trained to solve it. A student should score a 7.5 CGPA.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course which is CSE because it has more scope for the future.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: A growth full college life in my 20's.

detailed_review.Placements: As a graduate of Sri Eshwar College of Engineering in Computer and Communication Engineering, the highest package is 40 LPA. The average package ranges from 6 LPA - 10 LPA. Companies like Microsoft, Dell, Cadence, Thoughtworks, Lendingkart, etc., came for on-campus drives.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is very good and green. We have more than 20 labs for every domain in our college. Hostel is good and maintained in a neat way which is cleaned daily. Hostel food is okay. We too have mario and canteen inside our college where we can have snacks whenever needed.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in our department will be friendly and they keep supporting us in making us do projects. They help us win in many outside college or MNC hackathons and events. Course in our curriculum are updated to Industry 4.0 and emerging technology will start teaching from the first year onwards.
detailed_review.Other: Our college organizes various fests like Thiran and Dhrona where all the college students can be part of it. Various events take place at that time. It will be like a week of festival.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: The over-hyped college in Coimbatore SECE.

detailed_review.Placements: Our course is new. Still, there are no final years. Some students got placed with the maximum salary package of 7 LPA. The minimum salary package offered is 5 LPA. They are in their internship period. The top role offered is an autodesk. The salary package offered is 20 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The overall building is a little decent, but there is a signal to make calls. Wi-Fi is not strong enough when there are more than 40 devices connected to the Wi-Fi. This is not a good count when there is only 1 repeater per class. Each class has over 60 students. Some of us have to rely on our personal hotspot, which is also bad due to the poor signal.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are not bad in terms of behaviour or anything related. It is just they don't know much about the subject. But still, there are some faculty members who are experts in their subjects. As per the curriculum, it is okay but they change the syllabus after entering the semester sometimes.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: Life at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are really better here. The maximum package here is 50 lpa, and the minimum package is 4 lpa. The average package here is 6 LPA to 10 LPA. Many well-known companies come for placements. More than 90 percent of students will get placed every year. Internship is also provided from the 2nd year. It depends on the impact of your projects and communication.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Really good infrastructure. Other than classrooms, more labs and IT centers are present here. A library is also here with every book. Unlimited free Wi-Fi is available, as every class has smart boards. The hostel was very good here. It is more comfortable and safe. Food provided here is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members here are more knowledgeable, and their way of communication and teaching was more understandable. They support and help us in many ways to improve our skills. The exams and curriculum here are about like every college under Anna University.
detailed_review.Other: CSBS is about learning both computer science technical knowledge as well as the business management knowledge.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Honest review about life at Sri Eshwar.

detailed_review.Placements:
Student can opt for placement, higher studies or entrepreneurship. Those who opted for placement were 100% placed last year (2023). 
The highest package of all time is 45 LPA. The average package bagged by students here is 6 LPA. Almost 80% of students get into paid or unpaid internships from all tier of companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms have Wi-Fi, have charging ports for every bench, and have smartboards for interactive classes. A medical center is available. Hostel mess provides average food and there are few canteens inside campus with good food. Hostel rooms have all needed furniture, like a bed, study table, cupboards and Wi-Fi is available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the staff have adequate skills and are friendly and approachable at all times. Few staff lack few skills and seem to be less knowledgeable. English communication is not up to the mark among the faculty. The curriculum is industry-ready and is updated regularly and discussed with experts and alumni. Semester exams are quite difficult; correction is a little lenient. Scoring in exams needs a little hard work.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good, Bad, Ugly - A Review on SECE

detailed_review.Placements: 30 percent students in our batch secured placements with packages above 350000. The highest package for our course reached 100000 while the lowest was 350,000. Top recruiting companies include Caterpillar, Danfoss, Techinow, and Mr. Cooper. The internships offered by these companies are highly regarded and well-paying.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very good overall. However, the Wi-Fi in the labs is often slow, and the classrooms are somewhat outdated. The library is well-equipped, and there are many sports facilities; our college has won numerous trophies. The canteen food is also quite good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is commendable, with most faculty members holding Ph.D. degrees and all possessing master's degrees. The teaching methods are effective, although some faculty members with Ph.D.s lack practical knowledge. Semester exam question papers come from Anna University, which can be somewhat challenging, but most students manage to pass.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I've always had an interest in mechanical engineering, inspired by movies. While mechanical engineering is a challenging field, understanding it makes the learning process rewarding and engaging. The college organizes various functions that are enjoyable, and first-generation graduates receive a discount, although no other scholarships are available.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college with scholarship for merits.

detailed_review.Placements: our college is good at placements and most the students(95%) who opt for placements will place within finishing their college.The highest package was 40 lpa ,lowest 2.5 lpa and on average 8 lpa is provided for the students.Main roles includes in IT such as Full stack,ML engineer
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are many labs in college , but the network in college is very bad you won't get good network since the college is in village.The food available in college is good and affordable.The hostel food is also good .The are few facilities for sports but not much encouraged.There is a medical center inside the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teacher  are  friendly and some are well qualified and knowledgeable but not all. The course  syllabus is good which is good for industry requirement . The exams are not  much difficult it is easy to clear the exams.The pass percentage is based on the subject

reviews.course: B.E. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Sri Eshwar College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: In my opinion, the average placement performance at our college is lacking compared to some other colleges. Companies offering salary packages ranging from 3.1 LPA to 5.5 LPA come to hire students, and they conduct various rounds for screening the right candidates for the right positions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It's a better, stress-free campus. We are strictly asked to follow the principles insisted upon by the college to maintain a healthy environment. Our canteen serves all kinds of snacks, breakfast, lunch, and specific recipes followed every single day.
detailed_review.Faculty: Sometimes, I feel really disappointed with the lectures from the faculty members. Only a few of the teachers provide understandable classes. Before exams, I find myself confused about all the concepts and lose concentration in my studies due to a lack of clarity in the subject matter.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Sri Eshwar College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements:
Percentage of placement: 80%
The lowest package is 4 LPA.
The highest package is 44 LPA.
Top companies like HCL, TATA, Hyundai, Mahindra, BMW, etc. recruit students. Good college with good lab facilities. Students need to put in effort.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure with new buildings. Classrooms are spacious and well ventilated. Equipped with a projector and white box. Good Wi-Fi connection, but slow internet through Sim. The climate will be pleasant, and hot water will be available for bathing. Labs are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: 100 percent of teachers are Ph.D. holders with knowledge in their field of focus and are very friendly and helpful for research works and projects. The exams are moderately difficult and are both balanced for theoretical and practical knowledge.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: My engineering college review.

detailed_review.Placements:
Placements are good in our college. About 90 percent of students are placed with a good package.
The average package is 4 lacs. The maximum package is 44 lacs. Placement training is given in the 2nd year, according to the domain and is very intensive.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is very moderate. The labs are up to date and the classrooms have Wi-Fi connections and a smart board. Libraries have a wide range of technical books. There is a medical centre that has many facilities. There is a cafe, Mario, and plenty of food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are highly talented and they help us when necessary. Students can clear their doubts without hesitation. The course curriculum is well planned; they start the placement training in the second year. Semester exams can be a bit of a tough nut to crack.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: Exceptional Satisfaction: Achieving Success with Top Faculty & high placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Over 85% of the fourth-year students in my department have already secured placements, showcasing the college's dedication to ensuring successful career outcomes for its students. Salary statistics: The placements in my course have seen remarkable salary packages, with the highest offer reaching 24 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is awesome. Wi-Fi is enabled for the whole campus. The infrastructure of the hostel is also well and good. The food provided in the hostel mess is like home food. So no more worries about hostel food. The canteen food is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members of our college have completed Ph.D. Our department's industry-ready curriculum ensures students' skills and knowledge meet industry standards, fostering success in their careers. They are giving their best to make the students succeed.
detailed_review.Other: My department, CSBS, has an industry-ready syllabus so that we can learn computer science and, on the other hand, business modules. So we can work in both fields in times of layoffs also.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best college for students.

detailed_review.Placements: 90 percent of students were placed in the current final year. The highest package was 40 LPA. Top companies are Microsoft, Autodesk, and Commscope. And many companies visit this college for further placements of students. Many students were offered internships in big companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All over college surrounding has Wi-Fi facility. Hostel facility is available for both girls and boys. But some days the hostel food was insufficient for students. Eshwar college has very interesting labs and maker spaces to allow students to perform projects and improve their skills.
detailed_review.Faculty: Eshwar College faculty are very humble and friendly, so students can feel inspired to get the input. Exams are easier than those at Anna University. The curriculum was designed to be useful for student placements because it includes what is needed in companies.
detailed_review.Other: Every year, the college conducts an annual day and throne event. Additionally, many food fests and hackathons have been organized in the past year. The ECE course was very useful for me in terms of placements.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of placement in 2024.

detailed_review.Placements: As we all know, a recession is taking place in the IT industry. Still, our college tries its best and placed among 400 students out of 550. Comparing to other nearby colleges, SECE is doing well; it plays a major role in students' future. In my course, our HoD plays an important role as he invites many core companies for us.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has well-equipped classrooms with smart boards and visual projectors, specialized labs for practical sessions, access to a library with relevant books, journals, and online resources. It also has common areas for socializing and studying in the hostel, on-site cafeteria, and access to medical facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable in their respective fields, and we have the most expert staff in our college. The course curriculum is related to industry needs, and the semester exams are very easy to clear for students who understand the subject. The pass percentage is above 75 percent per class.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to learn about embedded IoT and VLSI designing.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Exceptional Faculty, Industry-Relevant, Supportive : Sri Eshwar College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 95% of the students enrolled in my course were successfully placed. At our College, the salary packages typically range from 4.5 Lacs to 15 Lacs. With renowned companies like Google and Microsoft as top recruiters, and an impressive 80% success rate in securing internships, my College undoubtedly provides exceptional opportunities. Hence, I confidently assert that it is an extraordinary institution.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I wouldn't say that the infrastructure is too good, but it's not like it's bad also. It is optimal. But the only problem that our College has is, the signal issues. But it won't be a problem, as our College offers unlimited free high-speed Wi-fi to all the students. The food and hostel accommodation are too good to be true to be honest. When comparing to all other colleges, our college provides wonderful hostel accommodation at a reasonable price. We also have a exclusive medical center for students, but the only problem is, it's not 24/7. And Lastly our college is also has good sports and library facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The instructors are not just highly skilled but also very friendly. The educational program is distinctive, and it aids the students in their future pursuits. Admittedly, the semester exams are challenging. However, despite this, our college boasts a commendable pass rate.
detailed_review.Other: Upon finishing my 12th standard, I, like any other student, found myself uncertain about my next steps. However, I was fortunate enough to secure a place in this college through Government Counseling. Undoubtedly, it has been the most remarkable event in my life. In my opinion, this college is the epitome of excellence for every middle-class student aspiring to succeed in life.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Sri Eshwar College of Engineering is the best college.

detailed_review.Placements: This college is one of the best engineering colleges in Coimbatore. Every year, more reputed companies offer jobs to the students of this college. The highest salary package is 12 LPA, and the lowest is 1.8 LPA. Therefore, the placements in this college are good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Sri Eshwar College of Engineering's infrastructure is very beautiful. The entire campus has free Wi-Fi, and CCTV camera facilities are available. Multiple laboratories and a common library for all departments are also accessible. The college hostels are maintained clean every day, and the mess provides good food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college faculty members are friendly to all students. They teach multiple lessons every day, clarify students' doubts at any time, and organize model exams and workshops events every month. The college has well-designed faculty members, and over 90% of students passed in 2021.
detailed_review.Other: I selected the mechanical engineering course in this college. There are multiple mechanical laboratories available, and the college is situated in a good environmental location. Medical facilities are also available.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The placements have raised high to packages upto INR 60 lpa.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are doing so well, and the students are getting placed in well-developed companies with a package of more than INR 20 lakhs. The stipend they are getting is INR 90k for internships and the placement cell makes sure that all the students get placed without failing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel atmosphere is so good and the hygiene is good. It feels like home and the infrastructure of this course is software and hardware. You will learn both the core and software sides, and you can finally choose where you would like to work, whether core or IT.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of the course are so good and experienced and the course is so detailed for us. The faculty are so kind; they see us just like their own sons and daughters and they sell only when needed. Exams are scheduled periodically and the paper standard is high.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Not the best college but this college was the best in placement and other activities.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, 100% placement is guaranteed. And after joining the college, I asked some of the seniors about placement. After that, they said that the placement was very good. And they said that CGPA was very important for placement. And now I am working for a good company. In our college, they place a lot of students in companies. Thank you.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Before joining these colleges, I visited many other colleges and all of them. I love this college infrastructure and our college lab facility was very good. So that we didn't struggle to use the lab. And I am also a hostel student and in hostels, the infrastructure and facilities for hostel students are very good. And our study hall was very attractive and motivating.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty were very friendly; they taught in a very understandable manner and they also motivated us to participate in many of the hackathons and other projects. I am studying the UG (Computer Communication Engineering) course. In this course, the subjects were very interesting and easy to learn. Our semester exams are very easy for me because I listen to the class very interactively, and their teaching style is quite funny and interesting.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: A reality of SECE college life.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement is said to be good. Top companies visit the college for freshers roles. It depends on the skill level of individual students. The highest package I heard was about INR 30 LPA, but currently around 6 students are placed for INR 26 LPA. The opportunities are very good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is very modern, with relatively newer buildings. The laboratories are decent. The only thing lacking is the hostel food, which is below par compared to other colleges. The hostel is as big as the entire college infrastructure.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is very good here. The teachers make us understand the concepts. The subjects are also relatively close to our placement. The semester exams are expected to be difficult for all. Getting through is not that difficult. The pass percentage is on par with other colleges.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: There are good faculty members but the teaching is so good.

detailed_review.Placements: The overall placements of our college are up to the mark. Even some of our seniors have been placed in good companies. Overall the placements are good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our course, Computer Science and business systems have a separate block and has a lab called business analytics laboratory. The hostel infrastructure is so nice. The hostel life is a great life in college days. In our college, the hostel life is so good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members and the professors are so nice and give a clear cut explanations about the courses which we study in our college life. There are exams for the preferred courses which we want to learn. Even the faculty members help in completing the courses.

faqs.answer: No, candidates cannot join Sri Eshwar College of Engineering directly for BTech or M.Tech course admission. The selection criteria for B.Tech course is Merit + TNEA counselling and GATE, CEETA for Mtech course. The eligibility criteria for the course are Class 12 and graduation.

faqs.question: How can I get admission for various courses at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: Sri Eshwar College of Engineering's admission process includes registration and merit-list preparation of the entrance exam as per respective courses. Candidates must follow the below steps to get a seat in the Sri Eshwar College of Engineering: STEP 1: Sri Eshwar College of Engineering Application Process 2025 Candidates looking for course admission at SECE must apply offline. To downlaod the application form students must visit the official website. STEP 2: Selection Rounds The selection criteria at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering are based on entrance exam scores. However, candidates have to complete the last educational qualification as per the respective courses set by the college. Students are selected based on the entrance exam of Merit + TNEA counselling for BTech and GATE, CEETA for M.Tech courses. STEP 3: Merit List and Admission Confirmation Once selection rounds are over, the institute releases a merit list. To allot and confirm the seat candidates are required to pay the application fee at the admission receipt centre.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for admission to M.Tech at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: Yes, to enrol for an ME course at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering, candidates must sit and appear for the entrance exam. The selection criteria for the ME course are GATE, CEETA. Apart from the selection criteria, candidates must complete Graduation with a 50% aggregate.

faqs.question: Is ME available at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: Yes, ME course is available at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering. SECE offers a two-year ME course at the PG level. To be eligible for the award of the degree, candidates shall complete the course in a maximum period of two years from the date of enrolment for the first semester of the course. Candidates must pass graduation with a 50% aggregate to apply for the ME course.

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: SECE library is established in an area of 500 sq.mts with 150 seating capacity. The Central Library is replete with 20,545 volumes of 8,491 title of books, 1,970 cd's and 383 back volume. OPAC software search facility to find out the availability of books in library is made available by Central library. SECE Library is a member of DELNET and subscribes to 145 AICTE Consortia journals with NPTEL video lectures available in NPTEL Server of library.

college_info.college_name: SMVEC: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Established in 1999, Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College - SMVEC is also known as SMVEC is located in Pondicherry. The institute offers courses like B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM, B.Sc. and MCA. These courses are offered in Full Time mode. A total of 39 courses offered by the Institute are available across streams such as Engineering, Medicine & Health Sciences, Business & Management Studies, IT & Software, Architecture & Planning and Law. The institute has all the necessary facilities to the students.
