SMVEC Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Experience in my college.

detailed_review.Placements: There are a total of 89% of students who got placed from my course. The highest package in my course is 4 LPA, and the highest package is 19 LPA. The top recruitment companies in my course are Google, Amazon, Microsoft, etc. A total of 80 percent of students got internships from my course at Microsoft. The top roles offered in my course are HR and manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure available in my course are Wi-Fi, with full speed and 24/7 availability. Labs are very big, and all resources are available. Classrooms are big and well-cleaned with digital boards. A well-stocked library is present with all resources available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful, qualified, and well-knowledgeable. The teaching quality of teachers is very good. The course curriculum is relevant, and this makes students industry-ready. The semester exam is not too tough but moderate. The passing percentage is 88 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have a great interest in the IT field, and the best thing about my course is the highest placement. I think the syllabus difficulty should be decreased. Events and fests happen yearly. Campus crowd and connectivity are also good. Scholarship is available. Extracurricular activities happen.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: To shine in your career, choose the best here, the best Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: At Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College, more than 85% of students got placed in top companies. The starting salary is about 3.5 LPA, especially in our department. Companies like TCS, Kaar, Zoho, Wipro, Cognizant, etc., are ready to hire students. About 78% of students got internships, and some with a stipend.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: About 150 acres of college with environmental amenities, and AICTE approved idea lab and library facilities. Hostel facility has been split into two, one is with AC and another without AC. Canteen food is also available in our college with good quality.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. Teaching quality is very nice. Course is relevant to the stream we chose, and it makes students industry-ready. It is not difficult to pass the examination, and semester duration is six months.
detailed_review.Other: It is the best college for your right career. Some extracurricular activities, cultural events, technical and non-technical events, etc., are conducted.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements at SMVEC are exceptional with over 95 percent of students placed annually. Top recruiters include Tech Core and Zenosys. The dedicated Career Services Cell conducts regular training sessions and mock interviews which are top notch and very nice.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure at Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College is modern and functional. The campus boasts smart classrooms, advanced laboratories, a digital library, an innovation hub and Wi-Fi-enabled classrooms. The eco-friendly architecture includes solar-powered buildings and green spaces.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are designed in such a way that both theoretical knowledge and practical application. The academic calendar includes continuous assessments, term exams and end-semester exams. The college conducts exams regularly.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is worth for money because the college is so good in everything but the sports are only less.

detailed_review.Placements: If we have a good CGPA, we will get good placements, but it doesn't mean that those with lower CGPAs won't have chances. There are many companies like TCS, Woho, and Vibrio are coming to our college. They provide placement training for all students, so placements are good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is so excellent. They have good infrastructure and they are building the new hostel. Classrooms and labs are in a good manner. The ideal lab of the college has a very good atmosphere. There we can get so many ideas.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are very friendly and willing to help us study, especially if we have any arrears. We can approach the old faculty members, and they will clarify our doubts. They will give simple notes by which we can understand the concepts.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Dissatisfied because of faculty, average placements and no enjoyment.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students were placed in this course in our college. The highest package is 18 LPA, and the average package is 3.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are TCS, Hexaware, Zoho, CTS, etc. The roles offered include Machine Learning Engineer, AI Engineer, Data Analyst, and Software Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructures are good for labs and the library, but in the classroom, it's average. They can't provide Wi-Fi for class; we have to use our personal devices. Hostels are not too good; they are moderate. Canteen food is also average, but prices are high compared to quantity and quality.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are also said to be normal for this course; we have to learn by ourselves. Yes, the course curriculum is relevant and makes the students industry-ready. Semester exams are good to score a grade, and the pass percentage is 30% in theory. Then, add the internal mark; totally, we have to score above or equal to 50.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course for data analyst. They did not conduct any event or any cultural.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Insights on Course Structure and Faculty in Computer Science.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly most of the students were placed in my batch, and it's still going on. Up to date, the highest salary was offered by Content Sack, a figure of 13 LPA. There are further more companies offering a minimum of 4 LPA. The company named Zoho took an intern from our batch, and other companies like Hexaware and Multicore also provided internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Coming to infrastructure, I would say that it's below average. They provide Wi-Fi within the circumstances, and it's not good either. The classrooms are good. Coming to labs, it's very well-equipped with updated systems, and the library is provided with more than 10,000 books of different genres.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty was quite short. It led to difficulties in the semester and providing quality education. Not all of them are good. There are some staff who take good care of your time. The curriculum is very strict to the course perspective, and they take advantage of every program conducted through the respective departments.
detailed_review.Other: I've chosen Computer Science and Engineering because it's a course everyone prefers these days, and I thought it has a good future. I wish they will focus on one perspective so we can lead in that domain. If we're talking about fests and extracurricular activities, they rarely happen.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: I almost like all faculty member.

detailed_review.Placements: From 7th semester the students become eligible for campus placements. There are many companies included all over the department like Virtusa, Wipro, TCS and much more. The Highest package of 2024 is 49 LPA and the average package is 4 L per annum. There are 75% of students get placed every year in my university. My plan after getting degree is higher studies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have more holidays as festivals but we have only festival in college means. It is cultural basically cultural is very nice in my college. The range is nearly 1 km from the entrance and accessibility of books is nearly 1 month. The faculties and technological provisions are very good. Mostly our College support extracurricular activities more. In our college no clubs and no social groups are formed.
detailed_review.Faculty: In my department the faculties are friendly and expert in teaching and guiding for carrier they do some carrier advise instead of regular classes. One of my favorite faculties are Dr.Amudhavalli mam and Dr.Delhi raj sir they gave me expertized teaching for carrier and what to do after the studies and friendly communication between them so I like them very much. There are up to 4 exams per semester and there is 8 semester. The exams are little bit easy when you learn and the failing ratio is too low in my department.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: we go under the technology and learn.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement period starts in the month November every year and lasts upto February, The circuital branch students gets a lot of chance in the placements compared to the students from the remaining branches. The average package is around some 24 lakhs per annum. Google - 1.2 lakhs stipend BNY melon - 75,000 Arceus ium - 1.18 l Move in Sync- 60000 Pattern - 50,000 Tata Steel - 40,000 and also we are provided with many research interns in the reputed institutes if country.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have more holidays as festivals but we have only festival in college means it is cultural basically. Cultural is very nice in my college. The range is nearly 1 km from the entrance and accessibility of books is nearly 1 month the faculties. Technological provisions are very good. Mostly our college support extracurricular activities more. In our college no clubs and no social groups are formed.
detailed_review.Faculty: Ration is 1 faculty to 9 student per batch. Faculties are very good and friendly. I'm from electrical department so my favorite is Mridusmita ma'am and Priyakshini ma'am. Although there are some strict teachers like maths sir named Pranab sir. But not hate anyone. There are 3 class test and one end semester exam for each subject. And lab exam too.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Our college provides good facilities and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: The lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA and the average salary package offered is 10 LPA. The highest salary package offered is 23 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Amazon, IBM, and Google. Almost 75% of students got placed in this course. Around 35% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has good infrastructure with good lab facilities. There are high-quality computer labs and clean classrooms. A library is available for the students in the AI & DS block. We also have a canteen with some snacks. There are sports like basketball, cricket, and badminton. Students can join NCC for a good career.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful to students. They are well-qualified and well-educated. They provide good knowledge. They teach in a good manner. The course provides good knowledge and the curriculum is relevant. The semester exams are difficult in this college. The pass percentage is 72%.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Faculty are too good. They will give you better understanding of the concepts.

detailed_review.Placements: In the last semester, you are eligible for placements. 150+ companies come. The average package is 7LPA. The companies from Microsoft to Accenture and TCS are all service-based companies that come here. The highest package is 25LPA. One of my friends got his offer of 25LPA from JP Morgan. The percentage of students who are placed is 30% to 40%. In their ADs, they say 100% placement, all of this is fake.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel according to me deserves a one-star. The rooms are small enough to accommodate only one person, however, two need to stay in one room. There is no AC availability here. If you need AC you have to pay 75,000 extra per year for it which is completely absurd. Hostel mess food is also not that great. There has been insects everywhere in the food time and again and we have complained about it multiple times, but no action has been taken. So in my opinion, paying 200000 for this hostel is not at all worth it. Better get an apartments outside the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course subjects are irrelevant. Instead of mastering one teach, they just teach every teach like web development, android development, flutter, and machines learning. But in campus placement, you just need to master one teach because all companies hire for one teach. That's why the curriculum is not very good. There teaching methods are also not good. They just come and read the PPT in front of you and leave.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Don't waste your life by joining this college.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, 60% of students in our class got placed in jobs, including famous companies like Google, Zogo, TCS, etc. Not everyone gets placed because some are interested in areas other than placements. Some are rejected due to skill issues; if you have a CGPA of 9 and above, you will definitely get a placement. They even teach you and help you prepare. Many from our college have become data specialists, entrepreneurs, and managers in companies like Google, Zogo, TCS, Infosys, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of my college is excellent, but sometimes there are many damages in the roads and classrooms, which get worse when it rains. We have libraries, but they don't have a period for reading. If you are interested, you can go to the admin office, get a library pass, and use the library. Other than that, the canteen service is not as good as you might think; it feels like a scam, so choose wisely.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some of the teachers are really talented, while some are just not helpful and tell us to study on our own. However, many teachers in our class teach us excellently, and if you have doubts during lectures, they clear them instantly.
detailed_review.Other: I am a student of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, and I chose this course because this is the only college near my city that offered it. However, it didn't go as well as I expected due to college timings and other concerns. The college has zero extracurricular activities, so if you want to excel in sports, please choose other colleges.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Nice college which is student friendly.

detailed_review.Placements: The average percentage of students who were placed in our course is 75%. The highest salary package is 8 Lacs per annum, and the lowest package salary package is 3 Lacs per annum. The top recruiting companies are Tata Motors and Rolls Royce. Approximately 60% of students secured internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There were many such facilities in the college, such as Wi-Fi access that was available. We had classrooms in all the classes, and the labs were well managed and organized with good quality chairs. There were all kinds of ways we could get hands-on experience. I don't live in a hostel because I live in my house.
detailed_review.Faculty: To be honest, from the mech faculty, the teachers were not so good and guided the students well, especially the HOD of the mech department, who was not at all helpful with our project submission. Also, the exams were easy, and reviewing the syllabus was good for us to be industry-ready, but it did build foundation courses for us.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Strict college but strictness and discipline makes you stronger.

detailed_review.Placements: To be frank, college placement is average; students getting hired by big firms are less. India Smart and Amazon are the top recruiters. If we take the average, nearly 70 to 80% of students from every batch get placed. About the salary package, the highest CTC is 11.8 LPA, the average CTC is 5 LPA, and the lowest is 3 LPA. Getting an internship is an easy thing but quality is important. Getting a good internship is tough. Some companies conduct interviews, and after all, no follow-up is sent to candidates.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is inspired by Western architecture and Portuguese architecture. The college environment is very strict; boys and girls can not talk on campus. The college library is good; it is open until 9 p.m. and six days a week. There is no proper drinking water facility on campus; drinking water comes in cans. The hostel fee is 60,000 plus a 5,000 deposit. Mess food is there but frankly, mess food is not good and not hygienic. There is no big canteen on campus, so we can not eat when we are hungry.
detailed_review.Faculty: 50% of teachers are too bad and strict. Our director of management treats us pathetically. If they find a small mistake and find out the language not respectful, not only us but also our parents will get a big lecture. But at the same time, they are very good at teaching. Our MBA course duration is 2 years and 4 semesters. 1 semester has 4-6 subjects and every subject has 5–6 chapters so the curriculum is very big. Semester exams are not very difficult; almost 90% of students pass.
detailed_review.Other: The one thing I mostly like about college is that they give scholarships to students who are very poor and single parent's children.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: The review about my college.

detailed_review.Placements: The number of students placed in my course is a minimum of 15. The top recruiting companies are TCS, Wipro and some other companies. They are mostly seeking freshers, and at the college, they will provide training for placements and jobs. The highest package they offer is 8 LPA, and the lowest package is 3 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My college has good infrastructure and a peaceful environment. They have separate buildings for each stream, like engineering, arts and sciences, law and so on. The labs are good but the equipment is a little bit old and the classrooms are simple and don't have projectors in them. In a library, you can't access all the books in it and its tough to take books in a library. About hostels, they have separate hostels for boys and girls but girls hostels are at medical colleges, and they have two buildings for boys. Hostel food was pretty bad so it was better to eat outside.
detailed_review.Faculty: About teacher experience, they are well experienced and have had experience for about 5 years. About their teaching method, it differs for each teacher and they teach well. You don't have to worry about the curriculum because they update the syllabus from year to year for industrial needs. The semester exams are pretty difficult and easy on your own. The pass percentage is an average 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because for the industrial boom because most of the companies are it so I chose it. They want to lower their feel structure because it is too high for the students. The main point is that they won't allow mobile devices the campus and the connectivity is so poor that events and festivals happen occasionally. About the extracurricular activities they have (NSS and NCC) and sports like tennis, volleyball, kabbadi, khokho, etc.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: I got new friends and good staffs in this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement Experience: Starting in the 5th semester, students are eligible for placements. The most famous companies are Microsoft, which offers 52 LPA, Cisco, which offers 25 LPA, and KLA, which offers 36 LPA. The highest package is 52 LPA and the average package is approximately 15 LPA. More than 80 percent of students are placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel Facilities: The hostel facilities are in good condition and the improvements to the hostel are not a must. The rooms are in good condition, the hostel food is very good and the registration process for the hostel and affordability are given in the admission block.
detailed_review.Faculty: Course Curriculum Overview: Initially, I was trying the Indian defense but then I chose NIMCET, through which I can pursue an MCA in NIT. Obviously, it is very helpful for me because here I am having the same opportunities as a B.Tech. student who has cleared JEE at the college. The academics are totally placement-oriented, which helps a lot in developing skills and the exam are also not that tough so we have enough time to develop any skill.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: A higher number of students with good placement records.

detailed_review.Placements: This college arranges both online and offline placements for students. Mostly, they arrange on-campus placements for their students. Nearly 50+ companies approached our college as of 2024 placements. Up to 70% of students were placed in those placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It was really superb infrastructure, with all the facilities. This college is only for engineering students. The laboratories present in our college are maintained properly with air-conditioned rooms. There is a digitalized library with all the facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers present here were highly helpful, motivating, supportive, and knowledgeable. It is a little bit difficult to crack semester examinations, so we need to study harder to clear the examinations. The faculty members present here always focus on practical classes.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Good experience here with nice teachers.

detailed_review.Placements: From the 4th semester on, you should be eligible for your placement. Work hard and attend the campus selection interviews. So many students are getting placed through campus placement; almost 80 percent of students are being placed every year. Right after the degree, I'm planning to start my own enterprise.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels are just awesome. The hostel are inside the college campus. So you do not have to feel tension about going to classes. Mess food are also good and delicious. It is hygienic and good for our health. Both non-veg and veg are available. In all rooms, there is one bed, one cupboard, one table, one chair, etc. A Wi-Fi facility is also provided to students. The registration process is very easy and it's done at admission time.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The course curriculum and faculty are good and the teaching is easy to understand. I took this course because of my interest in business. The faculty-to-student ratio is very excellent. The faculty members are highly qualified and use teaching methods that are easy to understand. Exams are held once in a month like semester-wise and it are easy to pass. Class Size:-56
Course Fee: INR 50000 per year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 70 of the students were placed in campus jobs; Wipro, Amazon, TCS, Infosys, and Tata mainly offer jobs in the college. The highest package offered in our course is 8 LPA per annum, and the lowest package offered in our college is 3 LPA per annum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: According to the infrastructure, all facilities are available for our course, and well, equipment is provided. The quality of the facilities in our hostels is good, and the food quality is good in the college. Here, Wi-Fi and classrooms are all provided by the college for all the students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful; they are friendly with the students, and also here, teachers are very helpful for the students; they clear all the doubts regarding the subjects, and the curriculum is regularly updated in the college, making the students industry-ready.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Review of Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College - SMVEC.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has very good placement records. In our college, 60-70% students get successfully placed. The highest placement package offered was 17 LPA. The lowest package offered was 2 LPA. Average offered package was between 2-5 LPA. Top recruiting companies in our course were Icon, Elite Elevators, HCL, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College has good infrastructure, and it was well-maintained and developed. College has high-speed Wi-Fi, labs, library, spacious classrooms, etc. The quality of facilities offered in our college was good enough. College has not provided any hostel facility. Sports and medical facilities are available in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty of our college were helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. All the professors in our college were giving their best for the students. Course curriculum followed in our course was relevant. It makes the students job ready. Semester exams in our college were relevant.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Placements of this college are awesome.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement of this college is best and around 70-80% of the students get placed every year. The average package offered is around 2-4 Lacs per annum and the highest package offered is around 8-16 Lacs per annum. Top companies like Oracle, Microsoft, Amazon, Flipkart, etc. visit the campus to recruit the student.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college and hostel is awesome. Hostel are good and convenient for students. College and hostel provide Wi-Fi facility. It also has a department of labs, library and classrooms are equipped with modern board. The taste of the food we get in the mess is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified and they are willing to clear doubts. Semester exams in college are medium and 40% is the passing marks. Well experienced and knowledgeable teachers are here. All the teachers hold a doctorate degree in the their particular subjects.

college_info.college_name: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering (also known as Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram) was established in 1985 in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram is approved by AICTE and offers a total of 32 courses at UG and PG levels in 15 specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Construction Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Information Technology and Mechanical Engineering. Furthermore, it offer courses such as B.E. / B.Tech and M.E./M.Tech in Full Time mode. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram fee structure includes a total tuition fee ranging from INR 50,000 and 4,35,000. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram has an annual seat intake of 1338 for all the programmes. It offers courses in stream such as Engineering. The institute has a safe and well-equipped campus with all the advanced facilities.

college_info_program.intro: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering popular programmes are BTech and MTech. The available courses equips students with all the necessary skills and knowledge to prosper in their career in Chemical Engineering and various related domains. SVCE empowers various students with leadership qualities so that the students can succeed in diversified fields. BTech and MTech students are placed in top companies at top positions such as Engineers, Web Developers, and others. Below mentioned are some of the SVCE courses and their respective eligibility and SVCE fee:

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has good infrastructure, helpful faculty, and placement training.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students from our batch got successfully placed. The highest package offered is 18 LPA, while the lowest is 3 LPA, with an average package of approximately 6 LPA. Top recruiting companies include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, and Capgemini. Nearly 60% of students get internships at companies like Deloitte, Cognizant, and local startups, which often convert to full-time offers. The main roles offered are Software Developer, Business Analyst, and System Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a good infrastructure overall. Classrooms are spacious with projectors. Labs are well-equipped with updated systems and fast Wi-Fi. The library has a wide range of books and decent seating. Hostel facilities are average with shared rooms, but maintenance is regular. Food in the mess is hygienic, but the taste could be improved. The campus is clean and secure, with 24-hour security guards.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are qualified and supportive. Teaching quality is decent. The curriculum is updated and covers important topics, making students reasonably industry-ready. Semester exams are moderately challenging but manageable with regular study. The pass percentage is good, around 85-90%.
detailed_review.Other: The best part is the supportive faculty and regular placement training that help boost confidence. I wish the college would invite more core companies and improve the hostel food quality.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical and Automation Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is more helpful for the students who are focused on their dreams.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% of students get placements in this course in our college. The highest package is 35 LPA and the lowest package is 4 LPA. The average package is 5.6 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are Honda, TVS, Cognizant, etc. 70-80% of students get internships from this course in companies like ISRO, Honda, Tech Mahindra, and TVS. Top roles offered are product management, designing sector, and product manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities here are very satisfactory with the best quality. It has a CAD lab which is very useful for students who like to do design in 3D and 2D. There are many computer labs for the CSE students to do programming. There is a BEE lab for the EEE students to learn about the electric and electronics courses.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching is very useful here and very helpful. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are quite difficult. Mainly talking about department heads, they are very cheerful to students and they are spending much time regarding students academics. They are trying to maintain a full history of all students in the class.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in robotics I chose this course. There are many things that would be better in my course.

reviews.course: M.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: In Sri Venkateswara College, the whole campus environment is just like heaven.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides average placements. The average salary package offered in the marketing field is 3 LPA. The placement cell keeps on sending emails of placements even after the college is over, so it is a good thing. They provide opportunities even after the completion of college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The library of this college is good and they issue books to students for free.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good enough but a few of them are not well-trained. They are unable to teach students properly and handle the class and students properly. We have a simple exam pattern. There are 2 external exams every year each semester. External exams are held 6 times in 3 years according to the semester. Exams are conducted for 75 marks. Our college gives 55 marks for internal exams by assessing our performance per semester. Internal exams are conducted for 25 marks each semester. Sri Venkateswara College is most weirdest College I found. It does not provide knowledge. They just ask about the attendance. Most of the students come to the college for attendance only.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied, and life at SVCE is pretty easy and good.

detailed_review.Placements: Passing out batch: 2025. The highest package is 21 LPA (only one got placed), the lowest package is 3.5 LPA. Top recruiter is KLA. Bulk recruiters are Accenture, Cognizant, Infosys, etc. The roles offered are software engineer, data analyst, machine learning, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is Wi-Fi access inside the campus, and we need to fill a form in the 1st year of college. Classrooms and the library are well-maintained. The food at the canteen is good, but there aren't many varieties. There is also a food court where you can get food like noodles and fried rice.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful in the CSE department and are also friendly. The course curriculum has been changed for junior batches, and it is good. There will be 3 CAT exams and 3 assignments for each subject in a semester. The difficulty level is moderate.
detailed_review.Other: A symposium will be conducted every year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Good college to complete your engineering course.

detailed_review.Placements: My department has an 80 percent placement rate. AGS Healthcare and Biocon are core companies that hire from my course, and Wipro, Tata Consultancy, and Infosys are top recruiters for IT positions. The highest salary offered for my course is 8 LPA, the lowest is 2.5 LPA, and the average salary is 3-4 LPA. All students in my course received internships, and the companies that hired interns were Aavin, Cancer Research Center, and IIT.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My college infrastructure is good. Classrooms have projectors, and the college provides full WiFi facilities. The library is very high class, with over 100,000 books. The library has its own app that lets students check out books and see when they are due. My college has very high-tech labs, especially in my department, biotechnology. The hostel rooms and campus are great, but the food is not that great. The college has a lot of sports and games, with a special emphasis on cricket.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty are highly knowledgeable and very friendly, and the teaching is superb. My teachers not only provide academic knowledge but also general knowledge and ideas for higher studies. Once a year, we have placement training. The curriculum is relevant to my course, and there are many ways for students to prepare for industry readiness, such as internships, curriculum, and mini projects. The semester question papers are easy to pass, but it is difficult to score high marks. The pass percentage is above 95%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: A great campus amidst woods with great placements and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Well, more than 80% of the students who sought placement have been placed. And the highest so far is 12 LPA. Some students were offered the role of team leaders and assistant scientist in R&D. In my course, many have opted for higher studies, so the students usually don’t need placements, but the other departments have had the said percentage of placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
The network seems to be a little problematic because of the high-voltage electricity cables across the campus, and we have a separate WiFi for our students. 
The food quality is a bit poor in the hostels, but the canteen food is great. And we have good medical facilities and a big ground for sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: They mentor us throughout the course and other activities. Yes, the curriculum is relevant, and we have frequent industrial visits, one per semester. The sem exams are quite hard for the late bloomers, but we have a pass percentage of 89% and above.
detailed_review.Other: Well, there are a minimum of festivals and events, but our college shows great importance in technical events and hackathons each year, conducted by various departments and clubs.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the college till now; really good infrastructure and a good environment.

detailed_review.Placements: Ninety percent of students are placed. The highest package is 46 LPA, and the average is 5.7 LPA. Synkromax Biotech Private Limited was one of the top recruiting companies for biotechnology. Some other top recruiters for SVCE include TCS, Cognizant, Infosys, Deloitte, Accenture, IBM, Amazon, Honeywell Ltd, Ford India, and DXC Technology. The top roles offered in my course are bioprocess engineer, research scientist, bioinformatic analyst, and biotechnology consultant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everything is good and sufficient for studying for four years, with no need for drastic changes in infrastructure. The canteen is good and cheap. The Wi-Fi facility is very good, and the department library, central library, and classrooms are well maintained. There is enough food for everybody in the mess and the canteen, and medical facilities are available 24/7. There are sports facilities including a tennis court, basketball court, cricket ground, football ground, swimming pool, and badminton court.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are qualified and good enough; if you are interested in any aspect of the course, you can ask without any hesitation. The course curriculum is relevant because the faculty changes it according to the nature of the course over time. This helps prepare students for the industry by taking them on industrial visits every semester and encouraging them to join internships.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I like biology a lot, and I didn't want to become a doctor.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: A good infrastructure college that prioritizes academic and general activities.

detailed_review.Placements:
I don't know about the complete placement statistics of our college. 
But on average, you get 4 LPA for almost every course. 
And last year, a senior Information Technology Branch girl from our college got an offer from Service Now for 42 LPA.
And generally placement is well above 80%.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Prepared food prices are decent and good in canteens.
But packed snacks and drinks are being sold at a bit higher price than the original price.
And I don't know much about hostels, as I'm a day scholar.
But from what I've heard, you get minimal variety, and taste is not up to mark. 
Also, this college is pure vegetarian.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Many experienced faculties are there with vast knowledge. 
Scoring good marks is easy.
But maintaining the grades and CGPA is tough due to relative grading.
And overall subject pass percentage is good for all branches.
detailed_review.Other:
Enjoyment events are limited. 
But college priorities include extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure but poor hostel facilities; average placement but friendly campus .

detailed_review.Placements: The placement at SVCE, Sriperumbudur, is quite good compared to other colleges in Chennai because of the branding of SVCE. Every year, almost all the students get placed but due to the global recession, in 2023 and 2024, there are students who are yet to be placed. The highest package stands at 26 LPA, and the lowest package is 2 LPA. The average package offered will stand at 4 LPA in 2023. Internships are offered to outstanding students only and average students are supposed to find them themselves. Cognizant is the leading recruiter.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure in SVCE is one of the best in the state. Almost all labs are well-equipped but some can be quite old and lack new equipment. If you compare them with other colleges, then SVCE labs are quite good. The hostel might be the worst part, as the food, the quality of the rooms, and the and the hygiene are below average. Since non-vegetarian foods aren't allowed, the fee they charge for hostels is too high for vegetarian food with poor quality and taste, along with old rooms and beds. There is a medical center where first aid and resting beds are available, which is a good thing and an ambulance will be available for transportation to the local hospital. Sports are well encouraged in SVCE, especially cricket. The ground is well maintained and we have a state-level team that has won several trophies.
detailed_review.Faculty: Since old facilities have retired or resigned, the quality of faculty members has degraded over the last few years. Still, there are enough experience facilities but it used to have more and more good facilities. The student-teacher ratio is around 20:1 (1 faculty will be in charge of 20 students). There are enough facilities at the college. The curriculum is updated and good compared to the Anna University curriculum but it needs a lot of improvement to meet international standards. It makes industry ready only to an extent but we have to learn so many things ourselves, as there are a lot of things they don't teach. The semester exams will have a weight of 60% and the remaining 40% will be calculated from internal exams, which include 3 informative assessment tests and assignments. The pass percentage averages around 65%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of the wide opportunities in the software and hardware fields. It allows you to learn programming as well as electronics. The method of testing students should be changed as cheating prevails. Lots and lots of events are conducted, as that is what SVCE is known for. The campus is not so crowded as it spans over 100 acres, but we have to have a little to reach the bus bay to the classrooms, canteen and department. Lots of scholarships are offered to deserving students and extracurricular activities like clubs are available, which enhance social skills.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college is very good in placement and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Above 80% of students are placed in placements. This will help every student's life. I don't know the package offered for my course. The companies are there for internships, like HCL, TCL, and Wipro. Many engineering students are placed in our college. Other department students placed very well in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure was superb. Many courses are available at our college. Labs are always superb. Unlimited Wi-Fi is available on the college campus and hostel. And also available for staff. In my college library, there are more than a million books.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful at our college. Our college staff is very qualified and very helpful. In our college, the president and vice president are available. Semester exams and informative assessment tests are very normal and sometimes hard in our college.
detailed_review.Other: I love electrical and electronics engineering courses. So I chose this course.

reviews.course: M.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Our college is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement opportunities are good in our college. Many companies visit our college and provide average salary packages. Flipkart, Amazon, Goldman Sachs, JP Morgan, HSBC, ICICI Bank, etc., visit our college. The average salary package offered is 15 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: First-year students should stay in a shared room. Each room has 2 fans, a table, and a cupboard. Second-year students got separate rooms. The menu is changed every 6 months. The food served in the hostel is very good. Hostel registration is done during the college admissions process. There are many apartments near our college. The hostel fee is Rs. 95,000 per year.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are from reputed universities. They are Ph.D. holders. The teacher-student ratio is 1:20. They have great teaching skills. Semester exams are conducted after every 6 months. Exams are easy to pass if we study well.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it has the best teachers, and provides the best placements.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Experience gives the pulse of campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement are very good in our college. Which our college train us how to crack the campus interviews and how to face the problem and consequences. The give us training for developing our skills, knowledge, leadership manner and etc. Based on your performance the campus interviews will be granted.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Infrastructure are very good and perfect and project 
also done by our college with innovative. And our
college hostel was good it feel us to be comfort and gives pace for focus in the studies, sports etc. In our 
College each and every thing gives positive vibes to stay our college.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The faculty are being in the professional and friendly manner. They motivate us for each and everything they will guide us for developing our skills and how to be 
Professions. We can be professional by the College training and curriculum are same as every colleges.
detailed_review.Other: I thought the course was well organized, clear and easy to follow. The given knowledgeable with excellent presentation skills.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is really good to find your dream.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students who got placed in our course is about 90% at top companies like Amazon, Deloitte, Goldman Sachs, and many more. Since it is an important department in our college, the internship offers are very high and about 100% of students got interns from top companies. Top roles from our college are analyst, HR, software engineer, product manager, and more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available in our department are very excellent. Facilities like classrooms, restrooms, playgrounds, and labs are highly good and neat to use. Labs are air-conditioned along with Wi-Fi. The library contains more than 2,00,000 books to read. The hostel food is very good and neat and hygienic. Medical facilities help immediately with any rescue.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. All the faculty members are professional. They are working hard for their students to score more marks. The way of teaching is extremely good and professional. The teaching quality is good and professional. The course curriculum is as expected. It is very good and easy to understand. Semester exams are not that difficult though teachers help in brush up on important topics before exams, so I felt easy to attempt semester exams. The pass percentage is 45%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I would like to do something in computer science. But after joining, I loved the way the college and the teaching are as the environment is very free and not so strict. We have the liberty to find out our goals and dreams. Events, fests, and other things are equally good compared to other colleges. The campus surroundings and scholarships are highly found in our college. Our college highly helps the students in many ways.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Very good placements in 2018.

detailed_review.Placements: 100% students get placed. The lowest package is 3lpa and the highest package is 26lpa. Zoho, Google, Accenture, laser & turbo, CTS, tcs, etc. are the top recruiters. Every student gets his/her internship from my course in core companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities provided in the laboratories, classrooms, and department halls are very good. The speed of wi-fi is very good. Rooms in the hostel are very neat. The quality of food provided in the canteen/mess is good for non-veg eaters.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The teachers are very helpful. They clear our doubts always and they are highly qualified and knowledgeable faculty members. The difficulty level of the semester exams is easy for me. According to anna university's regulations, internals (40) +externals (60)= full marks (100). 
Min 50 marks are required to pass in the semester exams.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good college with very good placement records .

detailed_review.Placements: More than 96 percent of the students are placed in the top most companlike Zoho, Cognizent, HCL, TCS, and many more very well reputed companies have visited the college and recruited many of the students in many top roles like executive manager, product analyst, Head recruiter and many more .
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructures are very tolerable but not so bad hostel food is not up to the mark and very poor in their services NON VEGETARIAN FOODS ARE NOT ALLOWED IN THE CAMPUS AND ARE NOT SOLD INSIDE. Laboratories have a decent setup and a managable Wi-Fi setup for which they charge 500.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in this college are very much experienced like all most 20 years on an average and they have a unique style of teaching students can expect a friendly atmosphere in the class and all over the college and the curriculum was not so relevant but as u progress the curriculum caught up so well and the pass percent is 40 .

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: One good thing about the college is that you get placed and this applies only for CSE and IT.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are the best for CSE and IT. Core companies provide a package of 10 to 12 LPA. But for other departments you mostly get only non core companies for placements and it is just average. Major companies that recruit are zoho, EY, IBM, Freshworks, Accenture, CTS, TCS.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel isn't that better especially the food is literally the worst when compared to many other colleges and they provide only vegetarian food and they don't allow you to use swiggy. There is no AC hostels and most buildings are too old. One best thing is you get chill cold water anytime inside the hostel. And there are no attached washrooms too.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are good, they teach concepts well and those who don't teach well give you better marks. And internals are one to lookout here and question papers are average. As per college curriculum it is compulsory to have completed internship of at least 2 weeks before completing 3rd year.
detailed_review.Other: From 2022 the fests are gonna be amazing and there are a lot of changes that are to be incorporated in the coming year.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good college experience, no strict rules, and you can enjoy in a proper way.

detailed_review.Placements: All the option A students get placed at the end of the 7th semester. The average salary package offered is from 3 LPA to 7 LPA. Top recruiting companies are TCS, Zoho, Accenture, Hyundai, and Royal Enfield. Mechanical students got internships for Hyundai and Royal Enfield. The top roles offered are quality management department and the manufacturing sector.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is so good. Wi-Fi, library, and labs are totally working and we have more mechanical equipment for practical learning. The quality of food is normal, not that great. Medical facilities and sports are top class. The hostel warden is also friendly and no alcohol or drugs are allowed on campus for students' safety. Ragging is banned in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are experienced and the quality of teaching is good. You can change the faculty if you request. The pass percentage is above 90% and the end semester exam is a bit tough as they don't give important questions. The courses are mostly core and it is very helpful for students who would like to pursue higher studies also.
detailed_review.Other: SVCE is one of the top colleges for mechanical engineering. They have the most equipment which is available only in industries. The practical knowledge is more and we get good experience. Events and fest are top class and extracurricular is compulsory for getting a degree, so maintenance of that is so good. Scholarship is given to my friends who are first graduates. Only thing is there will be no free hours to enjoy ourselves during a normal day.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: About 90% of students are surely placed in a year. The highest salary package offered to a student is 2 LPA. Students are placed in the top recruiting companies like TCS, CTS, and Cognizant. The students are offered the highest positions in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a good Wi-Fi facility, well-furnished classrooms, and the best library in Chennai. The college is good at sports and games. There is a huge ground to play. There are also well-furnished hostels with the best food and good taste. It has a lovely atmosphere on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very kind in our college. They are always ready to help and to guide for exams. This course curriculum is relevant and it makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are very easy to attend as teachers guide during the exams.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I found something interesting in this course.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: This college is a very good college.

detailed_review.Placements: About 90% of students are surely placed in a year. The highest salary package offered to a student is 2 LPA. Students are placed in the top recruiting companies like TCS, CTS, and Cognizant. The students are offered the highest positions in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a good Wi-Fi facility, well-furnished classrooms, and the best library in Chennai. The college is good at sports and games. There is a huge ground to play. There are also well-furnished hostels with the best food and good taste. It has a lovely atmosphere on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very kind in our college. They are always ready to help and to guide for exams. This course curriculum is relevant and it makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are very easy to attend as the teachers guide during the exams.
detailed_review.Other: Compared to other courses, IT has more scope in the upcoming years all over the world.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It provides excellent infrastructure and placements if students do not consider the fee.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are excellent in this college. Students can expects more offers in the placements. They also provide placements training but with fee, overall good placements. The final year students only 4 is left for placements, students need to be in a good CGPA and grade to get good placements, they also offer other ways like studying PG abroad or competitive exams or entrepreneurship. The students can also get financial support for their projects.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. It provides fully technical laboratories. Wi-Fi availability all over the campus and in hostel is good. The food is better than another college mess. But non-vegetarian is not allowed. They give equal importance to extra curricular activities. Regular sports events are held. Students can enjoy culturals often, and it will be very joyful. They conduct inter-college culturals also.
detailed_review.Faculty: This college provides good teaching and easily understandable. They can easily solve students' doubts. Monthly there will be a CAT exam for internal mark. Laboratories sessions are easy. They prepare notes to study for the CAT exams and semester exams it is very easily to study. The faculty members are very friendly. Mobiles are allowed in this college but not during the classes if they find students they will take the mobile and students can get it after the classes.
detailed_review.Other: I came through the counselling and this college is good overall except the fee. The fee structure is very high. For management students its even higher. If students prefer coming to college by local bus then they can get an exemption from paying the college transport fee, but it is not easy only if students show with proof. Food deliveries are not allowed. But deliveries like Amazon, Flipkart, and Big Basket are allowed though. Hostel is not strict.

admission.title: SVCE Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering admissions 2025 are open . The college offers courses in the field of Engineering, including B.E., B.Tech, M.E., M.Tech, and PhD. These courses are offered under the affiliation with Anna University. Admissions to all the courses are administered by the Directorate of Technical Education. SVCE admission is completely entrance-based. The Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering accepts CET and TANCET scores for BTech and MTech courses, respectively. Further, direct admissions are also offered through Lateral Entry. Candidates looking for course admission must apply through the official website of the college.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission in Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram?
faqs.answer: Candidates seeking course admission at Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram cannot enrol for direct admission. The college admits students based on scores from the CET/TANCET entrance exams. To enrol for course admission, students must apply through the official website. Aspirants can apply for course admission on the official website.

faqs.question: What entrance exams are accepted for BTech and M.Tech at Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram?
faqs.answer: SVCE accepts CET exam scores for BTech and TANCET/CET scores for M.Tech course. Out of the 1,020 total seats for the BTech course,  50% are filled up through Tamil Nadu Government Department of Technical Education Online-counseling. To be noted is that the seats offered by SVCE are filled up within the first few days of counseling with significant-high cut-off marks. The remaining 50% seats are filled through management quota, as per the Govt. norms.

faqs.question: What type of courses doesSri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram offer?
faqs.answer: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering offers B.E., B.Tech, M.E., M.Tech, and PhD. These courses are offered under the affiliation with Anna University. Candidates looking for course admission must apply at the official website. The duration of the UG course is four years, and the PG course is for two years, excluding PhD.

faqs.question: Is Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram admission open?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram admission is currently open. college_info.college_name: SVCET Chittoor: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary:
Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology (also known as SVCET) was established in 1998 in Chitoor, Andhra Pradesh. The institute offers a wide range of 13 UG and 18 PG Degree and Diploma programmes approved by AICTE. The institute is recognised by UGC as an autonomous body. Ranked 198 among the Top Engineering Colleges by NIRF 2022, MHRD, Govt. of India, SVCET offers NBA-accredited courses with a grade of 'A' by NAAC. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology also offers courses in affiliation with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Anantapur.
The institute offers courses in the fields of Civil Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and more, providing comprehensive education through experienced faculty and modern facilities. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology, Chittoor also offers excellent infrastructure. For more details on Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology, check out the table below:

college_info_program.intro: SVCET Chittoor offers a range of popular programs for 2025 admissions. Eligibility criteria include a minimum 50% aggregate in relevant subjects such as Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry for BTech, and specific entrance exams like AP EAMCET, GATE, AP PGECET, and APICET for MTech, MBA, and MCA respectively. Admission selections are based on these criteria to ensure qualified candidates join their desired courses at Sri VCET. reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: In my opinion, it is okay, and the faculty members are also good.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students who were placed is around 20%, and the remaining are still in search. The highest package is, I think, 10 LPA, and the lowest would be 3.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Cognizant, Accenture, L&T, etc. It would be around 30% of students who got internships from my course, and those are JSPIDER and Thopstech. The top roles offered are web developers and DevOps.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are good and decent facilities and infrastructure available in my college, like labs for different courses, separate classrooms for each section, and a library. I didn't know about the hostel at my college because I live in PGs near the college, but I have heard about the hostel from my friends, and they said it is okay.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, and well-qualified faculty are present, and they are mostly from Chennai, so the communication is also good. The semester exams are very strict and stressful because no copying is allowed. If anybody gets caught, the punishment would be very severe.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because my family suggested I take it. The things I would wish for are that there should be more capable and good labs present for this course.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Better for placements and nice environment.

detailed_review.Placements: In college it generally has good placements with a high percentage of students getting placed in companies like TCS and Wipro.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college's infrastructure is considered good, with well-equipped labs and classrooms, though some students mention areas for improvement in hostel facilities. College provides decent infrastructure with good labs and classrooms, though the hostel and mess facilities have room for improvement. Peaceful environment. The campus life is vibrant, with a diverse crowd of students contributing to a lively and engaging environment.
detailed_review.Faculty: College has knowledgeable and helpful faculty, with a curriculum that is relevant to current industry standards. The semester exams are generally considered challenging but fair. The college is often seen as a good value for money, providing a positive balance between academic quality and cost.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering (Bio-Medical Engineering)
reviews.review_title: A review of SVCET by P. Yaswanth.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 75% of students choose the ECE branch, while only 20% opt for EBM. The EBM group has diverse and highly demanding sectors.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel is good, but we desire daily cleaning and maintenance, and we want to inform cleaners to maintain hygiene. Hostel facilities are also good, and if any health issues arise, they respond quickly. However, the food is not good and lacks hygiene, you can verify this online.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching is average, and we need to concentrate on their teaching time. We also need to focus on training and development, and participate in some events, because it will help in the future. The semester is also somewhat hard to clear, with 10 subjects per semester, 5 labs, and 5 theory.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: College placement was in 2015, average 50 to 75, and good placement has allotted at the college.

detailed_review.Placements: At SVCET Chittoor, placements vary by department and year, but generally, 30-50% of students get placed. The highest salary package offered is typically around 16 LPA, with the lowest being around 3 LPA - 4 LPA, and the average around 5 LPA - 6 LPA, according to Shiksha. Top recruiting companies include TCS, Tata, Infosys, Amazon, Cognizant, and Wipro.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Campus also boasts a wide range of infrastructure, including a spacious food court, well-equipped labs, a central library, and various sports facilities. It has good van facilities and hostels are hygiene. It has good atmosphere and good facilities to learn.
detailed_review.Faculty: Qualified teachers and good teaching in semester. Sometimes difficult if we learn any content in course. For SVCET (Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology) faculty members, you can use words like teachers, professors, instructors, educators, mentors, or academic staff. They are also often referred to as faculty members. There's a more detailed breakdown, teachers are the most common and direct term for those who instruct students. Professors term is specifically used for faculty members in higher education, like colleges and universities.
detailed_review.Other: In the market, the ECE is most likely department and its better. Events, scholarships, and activities are also so good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college and faculty are good, with a great ambiance.

detailed_review.Placements: Amazon, Wipro, and many more companies hire students as internship candidates with good packages. Many companies offer training and placement to students. They provide jobs by monitoring them during the training period. Students get placed with good packages.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The rooms are good with ventilation. Both South Indian and North Indian foods are available in the mess. Sports meets are conducted. Sports are during college fests, and students have a chance to play at the state or national level.
detailed_review.Faculty: Good faculty. The course curriculum is relevant and makes us ready for the IT industry. Semester exams are mostly tough due to the course. In most cases, the pass percentage is 90%. Labs and extra subjects are also to improve students and make them confident.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in software engineering.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering

detailed_review.Placements: 65% of students got placed in our course. Top recruiters include Cognizant, Infosys, and 24/7.AI. Most students secured roles such as supportive executive and software developer. The highest package offered is 6 LPA, while the lowest is 3 LPA. 60% of people got internships in my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is equipped with a library, laboratories, and classrooms. The quality of the hostel is average, and the food provided is occasionally good. We have a nice canteen on campus that offers a variety of foods, fruit juices, and beverages. Our college has its own hospital. We also host various sports and games competitions throughout the year.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some of the teachers are knowledgeable and they are helpful. Some have even completed their Ph.D.s. The teaching quality in our college is good. The course curriculum is somewhat related. It may be ready for the industry. The semester exams are moderately difficult. 95% is the pass percentage.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in computer science. The best things are the faculty and labs. The college has to improve in visual classrooms. Our college conducts fests like selesta, pongal functions, freshers day.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The best review from a student of Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology Chittoor.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement scenario in this college is not great due to an outdated curriculum. The highest package offered is 5 LPA and the lowest package is 3 LPA. Cognizant and L&T are the top recruiting companies for our course. A fair percentage of students secured internships. Common roles offered include data science but overall placements need improvement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure for the course is poorly managed with adequate facilities. Classrooms labs and WiFi need major improvements. The hostel conditions are worst. Water supply is irregular and food availability in the mess is an issue, especially for those arriving late. Better management is needed to enhance the overall experience.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty member's support is not great as they seem to favor local students while giving less priority to North Indian and foreign students. The course curriculum is outdated and lacks industry relevance. However semester exams are quite easy, making it manageable for most students to pass.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: A genuine review of this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Not many students are getting placed, with an average package of 3 LPA which is not ideal. Top recruiters are Cognizant and L&T. However, the college supports students in securing internships, which is beneficial for many. Additionally, all teachers are supportive.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure for the course are neither very good nor very bad. Classrooms lack a proper Wi-Fi connection. But the labs, classrooms, and library are average considering the college fee. The hostel food is in poor condition. If students arrive late, they often miss their meals, which is a major drawback. However, the college canteen is good. Medical facilities, as well as sports and games, are neither excellent nor terrible, they are just average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful but some teachers are not helpful. They just say follow my instructions not necessary to ask any question. This course curriculum is relevant. It does not make students industry-ready. Semester exams are easy to get clear. This is one of the good things about this college.

faqs.answer: Yes, you may get direct admission into Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology through management quota. The college reserves a certain percentage of the seat intake for students applying under the management quota. The college follows the norms as specified by the Government of Andhra Pradesh. Interested students can connect with the college's administration desk to know more about the same.

placement_faqs.question: Is SVCET Chittoor hard to get?
placement_faqs.answer: SVCET Chittoor offers admission on the basis of merit and entrance. Candidates must secure a minimum aggregate of 45% to 50% in Class 12. Whereas, for graduation, candidates must secure a minimum aggregate of 50% to seek admission at PG level programme. In addition to this, candidates must secure valid score in accepted entrance exams such as GATE, Andhra Pradesh PGECET and others.

highlights.summary:
Sri Venkateswara University College of Engineering is college of Sri Venkateswara University Tirupati. The college was set up in 1959. It is associated to JNTU Anantapur. It has been recognised as institution offering engineering education programs, training human resources oriented to problem-solving and system development. It is approved by AICTE and UGC. It has been accredited with A Grade by NAAC. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate programmes in different fields such as Engineering, IT and Software.
